register.title: Create your account
register.pleaseVerifyEmail: Please check your email to verify your account.

login.title: Sign in to your account
login.verifyEmailDescription: Please check your inbox and verify your email address before logging in.

emailVerification.successDescription: You can now log in to your account.
emailVerification.failureDescription: The verification link is invalid or has expired. Please try again or request a new verification email.

premade.title: Premade Bouquets
premade.description: Ready-to-order bouquets, handmade with love and ready to be shipped.

custom.title: Custom Bouquets
custom.description: Have a special request? We can create a custom bouquet for any occasion.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.name: Name
contact.subject: Subject
contact.yourMessage: Tell us more about your inquiry...
contact.deadlineDateDescription: Do note that a bouquet takes 3-6 months to make

cart.title: Shopping Cart
cart.addedToCart: {name has been added to your cart.
cart.insufficientStockDescription: Some items in your cart exceed available stock. Please adjust quantities before proceeding to checkout.

products.title: Products
products.pleaseTryAgainLater: Please try again later or contact support.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this product?
dashboard.tryAgainLater: Please try again later or contact support.
dashboard.confirmMarkAsSoldTitle: Are you sure you want to mark this product as sold?
dashboard.confirmUndoSoldTitle: Are you sure you want to undo the sold status for this product?
dashboard.confirmMarkAsSoldDescription: This will set the product status to sold and make it unavailable for purchase.
dashboard.confirmUndoSoldDescription: This will set the product status back to active and make it available for purchase.

404.title: 404 - Page Not Found
404.description: The page you are looking for does not exist.

apiErrors.rateLimitDescription: You're making too many requests. Please wait a moment and try again.
apiErrors.sessionExpiredDescription: Please refresh the page and try again.
apiErrors.accessDeniedDescription: You don't have permission to perform this action.
apiErrors.invalidRequestDescription: Please check your input and try again.
apiErrors.notFoundDescription: The requested item could not be found.
apiErrors.serverErrorDescription: Something went wrong on our end. Please try again in a moment.
apiErrors.connectionProblemDescription: Unable to reach the server. Please check your internet connection.

success.emailVerifiedDescription: You can now log in to your account.

cart.addedToCart: {name} has been added to your cart.

auth.checkRegistrationInformation: Please check your registration information and try again
auth.missingRequiredFields: Email, username, and password are required
auth.checkLoginInformation: Please check your login information and try again
auth.verifyEmail: Please verify your email address (%s) before logging in
auth.unableToCompleteLogin: Unable to complete login. Please try again
auth.expiredToken: This link has expired. Please request a new one.

database.connectionError: Database connection error. Please try again.
database.serializationFailure: Database operation conflict. Please try again.
database.tooManyConnections: Service is currently busy. Please try again in a moment.
database.unknown: A database error occurred. Please try again.

products.checkStockInformation: Please check the stock information and try again
products.someStockFailedToUpdate: Some product stocks failed to update

foreignKeyViolation.delete: Cannot delete this item because it is being used elsewhere.
foreignKeyViolation.notExists: The referenced item does not exist.

checkViolation.emailFormat: Please provide a valid email address.
checkViolation.usernameLength: Username must be between 3 and 50 characters.
checkViolation.positiveValue: Price or amount must be a positive value.
checkViolation.stockQuantity: Stock quantity must be zero or greater.
checkViolation.futureDate: Expiration date must be in the future.
checkViolation.default: The provided value does not meet the required constraints.

uniqueViolation.email: An account with this email address already exists.
uniqueViolation.username: This username is already taken. Please choose a different one.
